document.full_text: bahrain said thursday it would dissolve the country's main shi'ite muslim opposition group, in its toughest crackdown yet on shi'ite dissidents who led an uprising to demand more say in the sunni-ruled monarchy.
document.title: bahrain seeks to dissolve main opposition group
lines_and_colors: bahrain said thursday it would dissolve the country's main shi'ite muslim opposition group, in its toughest crackdown yet on shi'ite dissidents who led an uprising to demand more say in the sunni-ruled monarchy.
